page.title: 13INFORMATION SYSTEMS 03800597
page.content: In a village of this size much information passes on by word of mouth. 2 thirds of the residents own telephones.There is a{public telephone in the village. A glass_fronted {notice_board}stands outside the village hall and announces news items,meetings etc.In the bus shelter are{bus timetables,}notices of social events and Parish Council Meetings. Once a month the Group of Anglican Churches publishes a{church magazine. Here news of christenings, marriages and deaths is printed. A{Diary of {Events}covering 3 months in advance is printed and pinned up on notice boards in the village. A{mobile library}from Hexham over 25 miles away,contains leaflets and information. The{Hexham {Courant,an independent weekly news {paper}publishes news of Tynedale District and forth_coming events.
